definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
to improve one's appearance (using cosmetics or cosmetic surgery)/to make oneself more attractive/to beautify
Associated Press (AP)/abbr. for 美國聯合通訊社|美国联合通讯社[Mei3 guo2 Lian2 he2 Tong1 xun4 she4]

sentences.english: This scenery is not very beautiful, but a picture of autumn.
sentences.chinese: 這景色不見得很美，卻是一幅秋日風情畫。

sentences.english: She says my roommate decorates her bed so nice, and mind was just normal.
sentences.chinese: 她說我室友的牀單那麼美，而我得那麼的普通。

sentences.english: S. joint communiques and the fundamental norms governing international relations.
sentences.chinese: 它違背《中美三個聯合公報》和基本的國際關係準則。

sentences.english: You have no feeling for the beauty of nature.
sentences.chinese: 大自然的美缺乏欣賞力。

sentences.english: How beautiful maleness is, if it finds its right expression.
sentences.chinese: 雄性是多美啊，假如它發現它正確的表達方式。

sentences.english: Pregnancy has you looking better than ever
sentences.chinese: 你懷孕後看起來比以前任何時候都美。

sentences.english: In the morning sunshine, underwater world was beautiful vi-sion.
sentences.chinese: 在早晨陽光的照射下，海底世界美得如夢如幻。

sentences.english: That was the beauty of it.
sentences.chinese: 這就是流浪的美之所在。

sentences.english: Dear Colleagues, It gives me great pleasure to co-chair the third round of the China-US Economic Dialogue together with Secretary Geithner.
sentences.chinese: 我很高興與蓋特納財長共同主持第三輪中美經濟對話。

sentences.english: Beauty can just stay a moment , like that shallow dimple .
sentences.chinese: 美，不過一瞬，猶若那個淺淺的酒窩。

sentences.english: You look like a melodious madrigal, beautiful snowy mountain, beautiful prairie.
sentences.chinese: 你象一隻悠揚的牧歌，美了雪山，美了草原。

sentences.english: You look like a melodious madrigal, beautiful snowy mountain, beautiful prairie.
sentences.chinese: 你象一隻悠揚的牧歌，美了雪山，美了草原。

sentences.english: Whose action is no stronger than a flower?
sentences.chinese: 美，她的活力比一朵花還柔脆。

sentences.english: Results 47 patients treated by this method were satisfied by results.
sentences.chinese: 結果47例患者術後外觀美，效果滿意。

sentences.english: The report noted the need for stronger US-China military ties.
sentences.chinese: 報告指出增強美中軍事聯繫的重要性。

sentences.english: Taurus will show Capricorn how to enjoy a well-deserved break every so often and how to appreciate beauty and comfort.
sentences.chinese: 牛向魔證實要經常享受生活的片刻，享受美和舒適。

definition: Homei town in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
good-looking/nice-looking/good (of a movie, book, TV show etc)/embarrassed/humiliated
to make up (one's face)/to dress/(of one's dress) beautiful
clown/2nd earthly branch: 1-3 a.m., 12th solar month (6th January to 3rd February), year of the Ox/ancient Chinese compass point: 30°
warms the heart and delights the eye (idiom)/pleasing/delightful
